channel.title: R on Amanda Peterson-Plunkett
channel.description: Recent content in R on Amanda Peterson-Plunkett

item.title: rstudio::conf 2019 Recap
item.description: Summary 1700+ attendees Next year: San Francisco Jan 27-30 Visualization 3D mapping, plotting, and printing with rayshader Tyler Morgan-Wall (Institute for Defense Analysis) Rayshader: building realistic 3D maps from elevation data Can overlay images onto map. Animations possible. 3-D printing of maps. Watch the video for lots of cool examples. Next version will contain 3D ggplots gganimate Live Cookbook Thomas Lin Pedersen (Software Engineer, RStudio) An implementation of the grammar of animated graphics, extension to ggplot2.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
